frontmatter.title: Creating a shared unit test utils library with Xcode
frontmatter.staticPreview: I've been talking a fair amount recently about how I've been writing a lot of unit tests for Fluency, my Confluence editor app, and how much I value having good tests to catch regressions and verify that the editor is actually working correctly. In the case of Fluency, I now have 70+ tests which test various parts of the app, and I've extracted various utils out of the actual...
